author: cjodea
msg: allow SOAP binding to work with a JBI Transport.

Right now the protocols supported by the binding are hard-coded but they should be read from configuration, or address-transport compatibility should be determined in a more dynamic fashion at runtime.

msg: Added velocity jars into the release version
